With generals barred, Myanmar junta sends bureaucrat to ASEAN meetingMyanmar's ruling generals remain barred from ASEAN's key meetings over their failure to implement a peace plan agreed with the bloc two months after a 2021 coup. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 02:55:46 GMT YZGOX7DJ7RKFBL3WQGE2SMBTZM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/with-generals-barred-myanmar-junta-sends-bureaucrat-asean-meeting-2024-01-29/Ananda Teresia世界亚太地区
Russia warship conducts anti-submarine drill in South China Sea - agenciesRussia's Pacific Fleet frigate Marshal Shaposhnikov has conducted an anti-submarine exercise in the South China Sea, Russian news agency reported on Monday, citing the fleet's press service. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 02:23:25 GMT EKQD5RLCTRJ3XNMUIQYXZOQ52U https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russia-warship-conducts-anti-submarine-drill-south-china-sea-agcies-2024-01-29/Reuters世界
Australia's resources minister seeks investment from S.Korea, JapanAustralia's resources minister has begun a week long trip to South Korea and Japan to discuss gas exports and critical minerals opportunities, as its government on Monday released a "prospectus" of 52 investment ready critical minerals projects. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 02:15:49 GMT IRDUJCLMKRIWXHF5N3IJSQK2X4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/australias-resources-minister-seeks-investment-skorea-japan-2024-01-29/Reuters市场商品
Australia appoints former minister to head sovereign wealth fundAustralia's centre-left Labor government on Monday said it would appoint a former climate change minister to chair the A$212 billion ($139 billion) sovereign wealth fund, the second successive ex-minister to hold the position. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 01:56:54 GMT H4PSQNO6NJMWJGY6NWW7P4KUQ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-appoints-former-minister-head-sovereign-wealth-fund-2024-01-29/Lewis Jackson世界亚太地区
Malaysia ex-finance minister charged with failing to declare assetsMalaysia on Monday charged a former finance minister for failing to comply with a notice to declare assets under the country's anti-corruption laws, amid a crackdown on graft involving prominent political and business figures. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 01:54:06 GMT T44AQRTZS5IEZBJP6SMUHAAYQI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/malaysia-ex-finance-minister-charged-with-alleged-failure-declare-assets-2024-01-29/Reuters世界亚太地区
Mexico activists protest return of bullfights to capitalAnimal rights defenders in Mexico City on Sunday marched to protest the return of the centuries-old spectacle of bullfighting to the capital after almost two years. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 01:13:08 GMT APSGI2SLXROUDCE3VS3UDCVVBQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexico-activists-protest-return-bullfights-capital-2024-01-29/Reuters世界美洲
Philippines and US intend to hold '2-plus-2' meeting in March, envoy saysThe Philippines and the United States intend to hold a "2-plus-2 meeting" of top diplomatic and defence officials in Manila in March, the Philippine ambassador to Washington said on Monday. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 23:39:09 GMT ZQ54T6Y7TNL2VLAY7H2TDPMYJU https://www.reuters.com/world/philippines-us-intend-hold-2-plus-2-meeting-march-envoy-says-2024-01-28/Reuters世界
UK government to ban disposable vapes to prevent use by childrenBritish Prime Minister Rishi Sunak will announce plans on Monday to ban the sale of disposable vapes to prevent their use by children, and reiterate the government's intention to introduce a law preventing younger generations from buying tobacco. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 22:51:03 GMT WWBK2SSPNBJ7HAO4IMS7WFPW7A https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uk-government-ban-disposable-vapes-prevent-use-by-children-2024-01-28/Reuters世界英国
Ukraine's Zelenskiy publishes income as part of transparency driveUkrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy made public his income over a two-year period on Sunday as part of a drive to promote transparency and root out endemic corruption. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 21:55:53 GMT M6PWGYZHNFLP5KSUDH5U6E2AEM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-zelenskiy-publishes-venue-part-transparency-drive-2024-01-28/Reuters世界欧洲
North Korea tests submarine-launched cruise missiles, KCNA saysNorth Korea tested its new strategic cruise missiles for the second time in a week on Sunday, calling it a newly developed submarine-launched cruise missile (SLCM), accelerating its navy's nuclear armament, state media reported on Monday. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 21:28:33 GMT IEZB3WJWG5OZLDHQN7MUYVL4FM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-tests-submarine-launched-cruise-missile-kcna-says-2024-01-28/Jack Kim世界亚太地区
Seeking Western support, Zelenskiy voices world war riskPresident Volodymyr Zelenskiy voiced the danger of the Ukraine conflict escalating into World War Three, as he pressed his case for support from nations from Germany to the United States in an interview with German state broadcaster ARD on Sunday.
